name: 陳盈竹
objective:
本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
This course contents heat transfer and its application.
schedule:
Week#1: Course overview & brief introduction to heat transfer
Week#2: Differential equations of heat transfer
Week#3: 1D Steady state conduction
Week#4: 2D Steady state conduction
Week#5: Transient conduction
Week#6: 1st mid-term exam
Week#7: Radiation heat transfer
Week#8: Surface properties (reflectivity, transmissivity, etc.)
Week#9: Radiation View Factors
Week#10: Radiation network model
Week#11: 2nd mid-term exam
Week#12: Convection heat transfer over externa surface
Week#13: Convection heat transfer over flat plate, cylinder, etc.
Week#14: Convection heat transfer in internal flow in tubes
Week#15: Free convection heat transfer
Week#16: Boiling and condensation
Week#17: Heat exchanger
Week#18: Final exam
materials:
1.	Incropera's Principles of Heat and Mass Transfer by F. P. Incropera et al., 8th Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Hoboken, N.J., 2019.
2.	熱傳遞 (精華版), 徐金城 編譯，高立，2021.
